trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGRA302_05436_SEQ_00<tab>By the look in her eyes, Yaana still smolders with rage.

TEXT_KINGRA302_05436_SEQ_01<tab>Your first opponent of the heavyweight division is Vamp Fatale. Using the soul of a desmodont, she sucks the life from her foes and is notorious for taking pleasure in others' pain. On your path to become grand champion, she is yet another domino that must fall. Steeling your resolve, you set off to face the deadly dominatrix.
※AAC Heavyweight M1 can be accessed via the Duty Finder.

TEXT_KINGRA302_05436_SEQ_02<tab>Despite her attempts to crush you under heel─or otherwise cut you into pieces with her horrific collection of saws and sharp objects─you manage to defeat the sadistic heel. Yaana will be eager to welcome the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of the hour back from the ring.
※In the event that you leave the area, you may return by speaking with the Arcadion attendant in front of the Arcadion.

TEXT_KINGRA302_05436_SEQ_03<tab>Beaming with pride upon your return, Yaana mentions that the audience went wild during your bout against the seductress. And having sufficiently savored your triumph, she appears to already be thinking ahead to your next match...
TEXT_KINGRA302_05436_YAANA_000_000<tab>Grrr... Just when I think I've seen it all with the president, he comes up with another underhanded move!
TEXT_KINGRA302_05436_YAANA_100_000<tab><sigh> If what Metem says is true, we've little hope of convincing your opponents to quit...
TEXT_KINGRA302_05436_YAANA_000_001<tab>There's nothing for it but to stay the course, then. While you fight to become grand champion, we trust in the others to rescue my sisters.
TEXT_KINGRA302_05436_YAANA_000_002<tab>If we can get the Drop of Life's whereabouts from the president in the end, we'll be able to save everyone.
TEXT_KINGRA302_05436_YAANA_000_100<tab>Right then, let's take a look at your first heavyweight opponent.
TEXT_KINGRA302_05436_YAANA_000_101<tab>Vamp Fatale, whom you had the displeasure of seeing in the broadcast earlier.
TEXT_KINGRA302_05436_YAANA_000_102<tab>She's a fiendish fighter who harnesses the soul of the desmodont, a giant bat whose power allows her to suck the life out of her opponents.

TEXT_KINGRA302_05436_YAANA_000_103<tab>Her biggest claim to infamy, though, is the fact that she's a sadist. Inflicting pain brings her pleasure, and her ring is filled with apparatuses for that purpose. Mind your surroundings out there, or you'll become her plaything.
TEXT_KINGRA302_05436_YAANA_000_104<tab>Remember: you have plenty of fans who believe in you. So believe in yourself, and show them the strength of the unenhanced warrior!
TEXT_KINGRA302_05436_YAANA_000_105<tab>Now, get out there, give Vamp Fatale what for, and claim your first heavyweight victory!

TEXT_KINGRA302_05436_YAANA_000_110<tab>You might not be aware, but Vamp Fatale and Honey are bitter rivals. They snipe at each other constantly, and when they fought in an open-weight bout, it was <var 1A 02 /var>ugly<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_KINGRA302_05436_YAANA_000_120<tab>And there it is─your first heavyweight victory! I never doubted you for a moment, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! And I'm sure you heard them, but the audience was going absolutely wild!
